newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: DSM shares drop as Q3 results disappoint.
newsitem.headline: DSM shares drop as Q3 results disappoint.

text.p: Shares in DSM NV traded 4.90 guilders lower at 161.70 guilders on Tuesday after the chemicals group reported lower than expected third quarter earnings.
The shares initially sunk as low as 160.00 guilders to show a loss of 6.60 as DSM said third quarter net profit fell to 178 million guilders from 234 million because of a margin squeeze.
Analysts had been expecting a net profit of 181 to 212 million guilders.
Analysts said they would probably reduce their full-year earnings estimates in the light of the third-quarter results.
"Net profits were only slightly lower than the 186 million guilders we were expecting, but the quality of earnings has deteriorated," said Bert Schouten, analyst with MeesPierson.
